metadata.title: CVE-2020-0305 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In cdev_get of char_dev.c, there is a possible use-after-free due to a racecondition. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with Systemexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-153467744

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
